The Battle of Grunwald is one of Jan Matejko's most famous and monumental works. This grand painting depicts the historic Battle of Grunwald (1410) between the Kingdom of Poland and the Teutonic Order. The painting is renowned for its intricate details and dramatic composition. Measuring a massive 426 cm by 987 cm (14 ft by 32 ft), it captures the chaos and intensity of one of medieval Europe's largest battles. The painting is currently held in the Warsaw National Museum in Poland.
